text: tabe ki pratyeka sattba ki arjana karache tate yini adhisthita rayechena? Tathapi tara allah‌ra sathe ansi damra karaya! Tumi bala -- ''odera nama da'o.’’ Tabe ki tomara tamke janate ca'o prthibite emana kichu bisaya ya tini janena na? Na eti bahyatah ekati katha matra? Na, odera chala-kala cittakarsaka mane haya tadera kache yara abisbasa posana kare, ara tadera phiriye ana haya satpatha theke. Ara yake allah pathabhrasta hate dena tara jan'ya tabe kono pathapradarsaka ne'i.
